item.title: About
item.description: I’m a data scientist from Ireland, with a doctorate in Machine Learning from the University of Cambridge. During my PhD, I specialised in the development of machine learning models to determine how vehicle manufacturers cheated fuel consumption standards. I’m also a Fellow of the Insight Data Science program in Palo Alto, and work in Google’s Trust & Safety team in Dublin. Beyond my academic experiences, I enjoy skiing, cycling , and reading non-fiction.
